product_name: Mammut Galaxy Duodess Superdry 10mm x 60m Dry Rope
long_description: An institution unto itself, the Galaxy's reputation for smooth handling, light weight and superb durability is a legend in the making. An all-around performer, rope is well-balanced for use in most applications; ideal for alpine use as well as mountaineering, sport and indoor climbing. Duodess option uses a pattern change to indicate the half-point of the rope. Superdry sheath and core treatment discourages water absorption while resisting dirt and abrasion. This go-anywhere rope enjoys high alpine routes, some sport routes at the crags and occasional glacial ascents. Meets or exceeds UIAA tests for falls, impact force and elongation.
short_description: An institution unto itself, the Galaxy's reputation for smooth handling, light weight and superb durability is a legend in the making.
